horo1: You can make a lot of progress towards reaching a goal today. The timing is right, and your energy is going to be focused. Nothing can distract you from something when you put your mind to it -- you just need to put your mind to it as early in the day as you possibly can. Be aggressive. Stake your claim before someone else does, because you won't be happy settling for second best. You should fight for what you want, but don't fight dirty -- there is no honor in that.
horo2: A golden egg of opportunity falls into your lap this month.
horo3: Be careful or you could fall for some tricks today.
horo4: Donâ€™t be discouraged, because every wrong attempt discarded is another step forward.
